fuzzing_params.Constraints: 1 <= xCoord.length == yCoord.length <= 2 * 10^5, 0 <= xCoord[i], yCoord[i] <= 8 * 10^7,All the given points are unique.
fuzzing_params.ATTENTION: we have reduced the constraints to 1/10th of the original constraints

problem_info.title: 3382. Maximum Area Rectangle With Point Constraints II
